summary: Implements a Flax (JAX) based Stable Diffusion pipeline that converts textual prompts into images by tokenizing text, encoding it with a CLIP model, generating latent representations with a conditional UNet, decoding them via a VAE, and optionally applying a safety checker, while supporting multiple diffusion schedulers.
business_intent: Offer a high‑performance, open‑source solution for text‑to‑image generation using Stable Diffusion on JAX/Flax, enabling developers and researchers to integrate fast, scalable generative AI capabilities into applications and services, with built‑in safety filtering and flexible scheduling options.
